job description:
Sr. Data Scientist in Stamford, CT
A trading company located in the Stamford/Greenwich area is in need of an experienced Data Scientist to join their Analytics and Advertising group. This individual will drive the strategy of how the firm leverages paid advertising through programming.
What will the selected Sr. Data Scientist do?
You will use data to develop and present recommendations on improving advertising ROI as well as solving other business problems. You will have the opportunity to lead the definition and implementation of quality metrics for ads and user experience. No experience in advertising required.
What are the top three must haves for this role?
  1. 3+ years’ experience in quantitative analysis or statistical modeling
  2. Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative discipline; Higher degrees a plus
  3. Experience with major scripting language
As a Sr. Data Scientist, you will work with...
  • Modeling frameworks (SciKit, SAS, R, MATLAB)
  • Data extraction
  • Data manipulation
  • Scripting
  • Advertising
  • Search engines
  • Social platforms
  • Paid search
